title: Mockify Options Schema
description: Generates mock file for a given TypeScript model

modelsFolderUrl.x-prompt:
[0mPlease specify the relative path where .model.ts files are located
[0m  Default path: [37;1m./models
[0m  >

mocksFolderUrl.x-prompt:
[0mPlease specify the relative path where .model.mock.ts files are to be generated
[0m  Default path: [37;1m./models/mocks
[0m  >
